alert.note: Alert for Braxton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 27 at 10:12PM EST until December 27 at 10:45PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston West Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Braxton County in north central West Virginia... * Until 1045 PM EST. * At 1011 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Gassaway, or 11 miles west of Sutton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sutton, Gassaway, Flatwoods, Exchange, Little Birch, Frametown, Wilsie, Servia and Centralia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 45 and 71. Route 19 between mile markers 64 and 68. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
